info.title: Hixbe SMS Gateway API
info.description:
A modern, developer-friendly SMS Gateway API supporting transactional, OTP, promotional and bulk messaging.

## Overview

The Hixbe SMS Gateway API enables you to send SMS messages programmatically with support for:

- **Transactional SMS**: Account notifications, confirmations, alerts
- **OTP Messages**: One-time passwords with optimized delivery routes
- **Promotional SMS**: Marketing campaigns and announcements
- **Bulk Messaging**: Send to thousands of recipients efficiently
- **Templates**: Reusable message templates with variable substitution
- **Webhooks**: Real-time delivery status notifications

## Authentication

Authenticate using your API key as a Bearer token:

```bash
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_live_xxxxx" \
  -H "Hixbe-Version: 2026-01-01" \
  https://api.hixbe.com/sms/messages
```

**API Key Types:**
- `sk_live_*` - Production keys for live messaging
- `sk_test_*` - Test keys for development (no actual SMS sent)

Get your API keys from the [Hixbe Dashboard](https://dashboard.hixbe.com/api-keys).

## Rate Limits

- **Standard accounts**: 100 requests/minute
- **Business accounts**: 1,000 requests/minute
- **Enterprise accounts**: Custom limits

Rate limit headers are included in all responses:
- `X-RateLimit-Limit`: Maximum requests per window
- `X-RateLimit-Remaining`: Requests remaining
- `X-RateLimit-Reset`: Unix timestamp when limit resets

## Message Routes

Different routes optimize for delivery speed, reliability, and cost:

| Route | Use Case | Delivery Speed | Cost |
|-------|----------|----------------|------|
| **otp** | One-time passwords | < 5 seconds | Premium |
| **transactional** | Notifications, alerts | < 30 seconds | Standard |
| **promotional** | Marketing messages | < 2 minutes | Economy |

## Phone Number Format

Phone numbers must be in international format without + or spaces:
- ✅ Correct: `8801712345678` (Bangladesh)
- ✅ Correct: `14155551234` (USA)
- ❌ Incorrect: `+880 171 234 5678`
- ❌ Incorrect: `01712345678`

## Idempotency

Include `Idempotency-Key` header to safely retry requests:

```bash
curl -H "Idempotency-Key: unique-key-123" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer sk_live_xxxxx" \
  ...
```

## Webhooks

Receive real-time delivery updates via webhooks. Events include:
- `message.queued` - Message accepted and queued
- `message.sent` - Message sent to carrier
- `message.delivered` - Successfully delivered
- `message.failed` - Delivery failed

## Support

Need help? Contact us:
- Email: support@hixbe.com
- Documentation: https://developer.hixbe.com
- Status: https://status.hixbe.com

bearerAuth.description: Use your API key as a Bearer token. Format: `Authorization: Bearer sk_live_xxxxx`

Hixbe-Version.name: Hixbe-Version
Hixbe-Version.description: API version in YYYY-MM-DD format. Using the latest version ensures access to newest features.

IdempotencyKey.name: Idempotency-Key
IdempotencyKey.description: Unique key for request idempotency. Prevents duplicate messages if you retry the same request within 24 hours.

Error.description: Standard error response with detailed information

message.example: Phone number must be in international format without spaces or special characters

request_id.description: Unique request identifier for support and debugging

Message.description: SMS message object with delivery status and metadata

body.example: Your OTP is 391202. Valid for 5 minutes.

segments.description: Number of SMS segments (1 segment = 160 chars)

sent_at.description: Timestamp when message was sent to carrier

low_balance_threshold.description: Balance threshold for low balance alerts

Sender.description: Sender ID registration and approval status

country.description: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) where sender ID is registered

rejection_reason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is rejected)

content.description: Template content with variables in {{variable}} format
content.example: Your OTP is {{code}}. Valid for {{minutes}} minutes. Do not share this code.

variables.description: List of variables used in template

usage_count.description: Number of times template has been used

Webhook.description: Webhook configuration for delivery status callbacks

secret.description: Secret key for webhook signature verification

BulkJob.description: Bulk messaging job status and statistics

Unauthorized.description: Authentication failed - invalid or missing API key

error.message: Invalid API key provided. Check your API key at https://dashboard.hixbe.com/api-keys
Too many requests. Please retry after 60 seconds.
Phone number must be in international format (e.g., 8801712345678)
Insufficient balance. Current balance: 5.20 BDT. Required: 25.00 BDT. Please recharge your account.

post.description:
Send a single SMS message to one recipient.

**Features:**
- Automatic route optimization based on message type
- Support for scheduled delivery
- Unicode and emoji support
- Automatic message segmentation
- Delivery status tracking

**Message Length:**
- Standard (GSM-7): 160 characters per segment
- Unicode: 70 characters per segment
- Each additional segment reduces by 7 characters for concatenation header

**Best Practices:**
- Use OTP route for time-sensitive verification codes
- Include sender ID for brand recognition
- Keep messages concise to minimize segments
- Use templates for consistent messaging
- Implement idempotency for reliable retries

to.description: Recipient phone number in international format (no + or spaces)

from.description: Sender ID (must be registered and approved). Defaults to account default sender.

message.example: Welcome to HIXBE! Your account has been activated successfully.

schedule_at.description: Schedule message for future delivery (ISO 8601 format, max 7 days ahead)

route.description: Message route. OTP: <5s delivery, Transactional: <30s, Promotional: <2min

reference_id.description: Optional reference ID for your internal tracking

callback_url.description: Optional webhook URL for this specific message (overrides account webhook)

value.message: Your OTP is 391202. Valid for 5 minutes. Do not share.
Your order #12345 has been confirmed. Estimated delivery: Jan 20.
Reminder: Your appointment is tomorrow at 2 PM.

201.description: Message accepted and queued for delivery

example.body: Your OTP is 391202. Valid for 5 minutes. Do not share.

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of sent messages with optional filters.

**Use Cases:**
- View message history
- Track delivery status
- Export message logs
- Audit messaging activity

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter messages created after this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter messages created before this date (ISO 8601)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific message including delivery status and timeline.

post.description:
Send SMS to multiple recipients in a single API call. Ideal for campaigns and notifications to large audiences.

**Features:**
- Send to up to 10,000 recipients per request
- Asynchronous processing
- Job status tracking
- Automatic rate limiting and queuing
- Per-recipient personalization support

**Best Practices:**
- Break very large lists into batches of 10,000
- Use off-peak hours for large campaigns
- Monitor job status via webhooks
- Test with small batches first

message.example: Flash Sale! 50% off everything today only. Shop now!

route.description: Message route (OTP not available for bulk)

schedule_at.description: Schedule bulk send for future time

example.message: Flash Sale! 50% off everything today only. Shop now at hixbe.com

get.description: Retrieve the status and statistics of a bulk messaging job.
Get all sender IDs registered to your account with their approval status.

post.description:
Submit a new sender ID for registration and approval.

**Requirements:**
- Alphanumeric: 3-11 characters, letters only
- Numeric: 3-15 digits
- Must not contain offensive content
- Business verification may be required

**Approval Time:**
- Standard: 1-3 business days
- Express: 24 hours (additional fee)

**Documents Required:**
- Business registration certificate
- Trade license
- Authorization letter (on company letterhead)

name.description: Desired sender ID (3-11 characters for alphanumeric)

documents.description: URLs of supporting documents (uploaded via /files endpoint)

get.description: Retrieve all message templates in your account.

post.description:
Create a new message template with variable placeholders.

**Variables:**
- Use double curly braces: `{{variable_name}}`
- Variables are case-sensitive
- No spaces in variable names
- Example: `Hello {{name}}, your code is {{code}}`

**Benefits:**
- Consistent messaging across your application
- Easy personalization
- Reusability
- Version control

value.name: OTP Verification
value.content: Your {{app_name}} verification code is {{code}}. Valid for {{minutes}} minutes.

post.description: Send SMS using a template with variable substitution.

get.description:
Retrieve detailed usage statistics and analytics for a specific period.

**Metrics Included:**
- Total messages sent
- Delivery rates
- Breakdown by route
- Cost analysis
- Failure reasons
Retrieve current account balance and credit information.
Retrieve all registered webhooks for your account.

post.description:
Register a new webhook endpoint to receive delivery status updates.

**Security:**
- Webhooks are signed with HMAC-SHA256
- Verify signature using `X-Hixbe-Signature` header
- Secret is provided in the response

**Retry Logic:**
- Failed deliveries are retried with exponential backoff
- Maximum 3 retry attempts
- Webhook disabled after 10 consecutive failures

**Payload Example:**
```json
{
  "event": "message.delivered",
  "message_id": "msg_abc123",
  "to": "8801712345678",
  "status": "delivered",
  "delivered_at": "2026-01-15T10:30:15Z"
}
```

delete.description: Remove a webhook endpoint from your account.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific webhook.

put.description: Update webhook configuration including URL, events, or description.
